content.text:
# List of honours of Pahang awarded to heads of state and royalty

This article serves as an index – as complete as possible – of all the honorific orders or similar decorations awarded by Pahang, classified by Monarchies chapter and Republics chapter, and, under each chapter, recipients' countries and the detailed list of recipients.
Monarchies
Monarchies of Malaysia
Pahang Royal Family
They have been awarded :
Family of Al-Sultan Abdullah
* Al-Sultan Abdullah Ri'ayatuddin Al-Mustafa Billah Shah, Sultan of Pahang :
**  Member and Grand Master of the Royal Family Order of Pahang (DKP, since 11 January 2019)
**  Member 1st class (DK I, 23 October 1977) and Grand Master of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (since 11 January 2019)
**  Grand Knight and Founding Grand Master of the Order of Al-Sultan Abdullah of Pahang (SAAS, since 30 July 2024)
**  Grand Master of the Grand Royal Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SDSA, since 11 January 2019)
**  Grand Knight (SSAP, 24 October 1977) and Grand Master of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (since 11 January 2019)
**  Grand Knight and Grand Master of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, since 11 January 2019)
* Tunku Azizah Aminah Maimunah Iskandariah, Tengku Ampuan of Pahang :
**  Member 1st class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK I)
**  Member 2nd class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK II, 24 October 1989)
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Al-Sultan Abdullah of Pahang (SAAS, 30 July 2024) with title ''Dato' Sri Setia
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang  (SIMP) with title Dato' Indera
* Tengku Hassanal Ibrahim Alam Shah, Crown Prince of Pahang :
**  Member 1st class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK I, 29 January 2019)
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Al-Sultan Abdullah of Pahang (SAAS, 30 July 2024) with title Dato' Sri Setia
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 24 October 2016) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP) with title Dato' Indera
* Tengku Amir Nasser Ibrahim Shah, Adoptive son of sultan :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 15 October 2020) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 24 October 2016) with title Dato' Indera''
* Che Puan Panglima Puteri Suraiya Afzan, Tengku Amir Nasser's wife :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 24 October 2016) with title ''Dato' Indera''
* Tengku Muhammad Iskandar Ri'ayatuddin Shah, second son of sultan :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Al-Sultan Abdullah of Pahang (SAAS, 30 July 2024) with title ''Dato' Sri Setia
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 15 October 2020) with title Dato’ Sri
* Tengku Ahmad Ismail Muadzam Shah, third son of sultan :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 15 October 2020) with title Dato' Indera
* Tengku Puteri Iman Afzan, first daughter of sultan :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Al-Sultan Abdullah of Pahang (SAAS, 30 July 2024) with title Dato' Sri Setia
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 15 October 2020) with title Dato’ Sri''
* Tengku Abu Bakar Ahmad, Tengku Puteri Iman Afzan's husband :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 4 August 2023) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 15 October 2020) with title ''Dato' Indera
* Tengku Puteri Ilisha Ameera, second daughter of sultan :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 15 October 2020) with title Dato' Indera
* Tengku Puteri Ilyana, third daughter of sultan :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 15 October 2020) with title Dato' Indera
* Tengku Puteri Afzan Aminah Hafidzatu’llah, fourth daughter of sultan :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 15 October 2020) with title Dato' Indera
* Tengku Puteri Jihan Azizah Athiyatullah, fifth daughter of sultan :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 15 October 2020) with title Dato' Indera
Family of Sultan Haji Ahmad Shah
* Cik Puan Besar Hajjah Kalsom binti Abdullah, The second wife of Sultan Haji Ahmad Shah
**  Member 1st class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK I, 25 October 1999)
* Tengku Abdul Rahman, Tengku Muda'', Sultan Haji Ahmad Shah's second son
**  Member 2nd class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK II, 24 October 1988)
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 24 October 1980) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 23 November 2023) with title ''Dato' Indera
* Cik Puan Julita Aishah, Cik Puan Muda'', Tengku Abdul Rahman's first wife :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 28 October 2006) with title Dato’ Sri
* Cik Puan Nur Bahiyah, Tengku Abdul Rahman's second wife :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 23 November 2023) with title ''Dato' Indera
* Tengku Abdul Fahd Muadzam, Tengku Arif Temenggong'', Sultan Haji Ahmad Shah's third son
**  Member 2nd class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK II, 24 October 2008)
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sri Setia Al-Sultan Abdullah Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SAAS, 30 July 2024) with title ''Dato' Sri Setia
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 23 November 2023) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 23 November 2023) with title Dato' Indera
* Tengku Meriam, Tengku Putri Sri Lela Wangsa'', Sultan Haji Ahmad Shah's first daughter :
**  Member 2nd class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK II, 24 October 1988)
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sri Setia Al-Sultan Abdullah Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SAAS, 12 September 2024) with title ''Dato' Sri Setia
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 23 November 2023) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP) with title Dato' Indera''
* Sheikh Mohamad Toufic Al-Ozeir, Tengku Meriam's second husband :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 24 October 1998) with title Dato’ Sri
* Tengku Muhaini, Tengku Putri Sri Teja, Sultan Haji Ahmad Shah's second daughter :
**  Member 2nd class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK II, 24 October 1997)
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sri Setia Al-Sultan Abdullah Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SAAS, 30 July 2024) with title ''Dato' Sri Setia
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 23 November 2023) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP) with title Dato' Indera''
* Affendi Buang, Tengku Muhaini's second husband :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 24 October 2014) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Knight Companion of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (DIMP, 24 October 2008) with title Dato'
**  Companion of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SAP, 26 October 2003)
**  Member of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (AMP)
* Tengku Aishah Marcella, Tengku Putri Sri Kamala, Sultan Haji Ahmad Shah's third daughter :
**  Member 2nd class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK II, 24 October 1997)
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sri Setia Al-Sultan Abdullah Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SAAS, 30 July 2024) with title ''Dato' Sri Setia
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP) with title Dato' Indera
* Tengku Nong Fatimah, Tengku Putri Sri Setia Bakti'', Sultan Haji Ahmad Shah's fourth daughter :
**  Member 2nd class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK II, 24 October 2000)
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sri Setia Al-Sultan Abdullah Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SAAS, 30 July 2024) with title ''Dato' Sri Setia
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 23 November 2023) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 24 October 1988) with title Dato' Indera
* Tengku Shahariah, Tengku Putri Sri Bongsu'', Sultan Haji Ahmad Shah's fifth daughter :
**  Member 2nd class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK II, 2001)
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sri Setia Al-Sultan Abdullah Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SAAS, 30 July 2024) with title ''Dato' Sri Setia
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 23 November 2023) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 1990) with title Dato' Indera''
* Omar Naresh Mohan Abdullah, Tengku Shahariah's second husband :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 4 August 2023) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Knight Companion of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 24 October 2016) with title ''Dato' Indera''
Family of Sultan Abu Bakar
* Tengku Azlan, Sultan Abu Bakar's sixth son.
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 2007) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 2002) with title ''Dato' Indera
**  Knight Companion of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (DSAP, 1979) with title Dato'''
* Tengku Azman, Sultan Abu Bakar's seventh son.
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 2008) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 2002) with title ''Dato' Indera''
* Tengku Kamal Baharin, Sultan Abu Bakar's tenth son.
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 24 October 2005) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 2001) with title ''Dato' Indera
**  Knight Companion of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (DIMP, 24 October 1995) with title Dato'''
* Tengku Omar, Sultan Abu Bakar's eleventh son.
**  Knight Companion of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (DSAP, 1994) with title Dato'
Johor Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Sultan Ibrahim, Sultan of Johor :
**  Member 1st class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK I, 8 December 2023)
**  Member 2nd class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK II, 24 October 1997)
Kedah Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Al-Aminul Karim Sultan Sallehuddin, Sultan of Kedah :
**  Member 1st class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK I, 5 September 2019)
Kelantan Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Sultan Muhammad V, Sultan of Kelantan :
**  Member 1st class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK I, 20 December 2023)
Perak Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Sultan Nazrin Muizzuddin Shah, Sultan of Perak :
**  Member 1st class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK I, 28 November 2019)
* Raja Nazhatul Shima, Raja Puan Besar of Perak :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 24 October 2018) with title Dato’ Sri
Perlis Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Tuanku Syed Sirajuddin, Raja of Perlis :
**  Member 1st class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK I, 26 October 2005)
* Tuanku Tengku Fauziah, Raja Perempuan of Perlis :
**  Member 1st class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK I, 26 October 2005)
Selangor Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Sultan Sharafuddin Idris Shah Alhaj, Sultan of Selangor :
**  Member 1st class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK I, 8 April 2021)
Terengganu Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Tengku Mustaffa Kamel, Tengku Sri Bendahara Raja (Sultan Mizan Zainal Abidin's first younger brother) :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 26 October 2003) with title ''Dato' Indera
Governors of Malacca
They have been awarded :
* Mohd Khalil Yaakob, 6th Yang di-Pertua Negeri of Malacca (4 June 2004 – 3 June 2020) :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP, 25 October 1987) with title Dato’ Sri
**  Grand Knight of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SIMP, 24 October 1985) with title Dato' Indera
**  Knight Companion of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (DSAP) with title Dato'''
**  Companion of the Order of the Crown of Pahang (SMP)
Asian monarchies
Brunei Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Sultan Haji Hassanal Bolkiah, Sultan of Brunei :
**  Member 1st class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK I, 19 May 1984)
* Prince Mohamed Bolkiah, sultan's brother :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP) with title ''Dato' Sri''
* Prince Jefri Bolkiah, sultan's brother :
**  Grand Knight of the Order of Sultan Ahmad Shah of Pahang (SSAP) with title ''Dato' Sri''
House of Nahyan
They have been awarded :
* Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, 3rd President of the United Arab Emirates and Ruler of Abu Dhabi :
**  Member 1st class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK I, 30 November 2023)
* Sheikh Khaled bin Mohamed Al Nahyan, Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi :
**  Member 2nd class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK II, 23 May 2023)
Jordanian Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Prince Ali bin Hussein, King Abdullah II's half brother :
**  Member 2nd class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK II, 30 July 2024)
European monarchies
Monegasque Princely Family
They have been awarded :
* Albert II, Prince of Monaco :
**  Member 1st class of the Family Order of the Crown of Indra of Pahang (DK I, 27 November 2023)
See also
* Mirror page : List of honours of the Pahang Royal Family by country
References
